Title: The Devil's Proof
Writer: Jared Hedges (english adaptation), Jun Kumagai (screenplay), Tow Ubukata (developed by)
Actors: Kana Hanazawa, Robert McCollum, Kate Oxley, Sarah Wiedenheft
Plot: Inspector Tsunemori starts to believe that the missing inspector has been kidnapped by a person who can't be read by the psycho-scanners. Since this should be impossible, she asks Jouji Saiga, who's now locked up, for help.
